pullrequest.title: Added triangle3 class, and helper functions in other classes

content.raw:
This seems to conflict with the function description that this is the "Return value of the first intersection point". I would expect the **first** point to be the one closest to line[0], in this case `(0.1, 0.1, 0.1)`.

Maybe we can change the description to the point closest to the edges of the triangle? Is this the actual returned value?
content.html:
This seems to conflict with the function description that this is the "Return value of the first intersection point". I would expect the first point to be the one closest to line[0], in this case (0.1, 0.1, 0.1).

Maybe we can change the description to the point closest to the edges of the triangle? Is this the actual returned value?
